featured.text: Tim: Someone left a schoolbag on the bus.
Instead of a gift, Tim’s grandmother always _____
How long had Tim and Dom been at sea when their boat was hit by a fishing boat?
Tim felt it would be safer to stay on board the boat.

other.text: Tim and Dom were too careless (B) nobody on the fishing ship saw them (C) the speed of the fishing ship was too fast (D) their rowboat was not strong enough 43.
When the ship stopped, I eventually saw Tim, and I was very, very relieved that we were still alive.
I shouted at them to stop the ship and to get Tim out.

definition.zh_def: 一種男性名字，通常是 Timothy 的簡稱。
definition.en_def: A male given name, often a short form of Timothy.
definition.example: Tim is going to the store to buy some groceries.
